children.name: Get an overview of your Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of your process. It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas of concern to investigate further.
Page 1: Process Discovery - A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths.
Page 2: KPIs - Key KPIs and Process Discovery
Page 3: Analysis - High-level analysis of key use cases
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type 'System' or 'Service' or via Batch Job

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" 
        	IN ('System','Service','Batch Job')))))
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name))) 
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) - FIRST(end_time))) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of Cases with Changes
children.description: Definition: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' 
		OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percent of Cases with Rework
children.description: Definition: Whenever one events happens more than once for one case it is considered rework

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1) 
    	FROM (SELECT OCCURRENCE(EVENT_NAME) AS occurrence) AS sub)) 
/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ø Cycle Time for Cases with Rework

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME) - FIRST(END_TIME))) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1) 
    	FROM (SELECT OCCURRENCE(EVENT_NAME) AS occurrence) AS sub))
FROM THIS_PROCESS
SELECT count(case_id) FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total Number of Cases with Changes
children.description: Definition: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' 
    	OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%' )))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total Number of Cases with Rework
children.description: Definition: Whenever one events happens more than once for one case it is considered rework

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1) 
    	FROM (SELECT OCCURRENCE(EVENT_NAME) AS occurrence) AS sub))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ø Cycle Time for Cases with Changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) - FIRST (END_TIME))) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME LIKE '%Update%' 
		OR EVENT_NAME LIKE '%Change%')))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ø Cycle Time for Cases without any Automation

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) - FIRST (END_TIME))) 
  FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR("Event Created By User Type" 
  	NOT IN ('System','Service','Batch Job'))))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total Number of Automated Events
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type 'System' or 'Service' or via Batch Job

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" 
        	IN ('System','Service','Batch Job')))
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
SELECT count(event_name) FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

SELECT 
	count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) as Month,
    count(case_id) as "# Cases"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) as Month,
    
    SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" 
        	IN ('System','Service','Batch Job')))))
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name))) 
* 100 AS "Automation Rate"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Average Number of Changes per Case Over Time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) as Month,
    
    COUNT (CASE_ID) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' 
		OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Change Rate"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Percent of Cases with Rework Over Time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) as Month,
    
    COUNT (CASE_ID) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1) 
    	FROM (SELECT OCCURRENCE(EVENT_NAME) AS occurrence) AS sub)) 
/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Rework Rate"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) AS Month,
    
    AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) - FIRST(end_time))) AS "Average Cycle Time"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) - FIRST(end_time))) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
